description: Navigate to Starbucks The Ninth Tower. You are currently on the driveway next to The Ninth Tower, which is the large glass building on your right. The Starbucks Coffee sign is clearly visible on the ground floor facade of this building. Simply walk straight ahead for a short distance to reach the destination on your right.
